Join us for an inspiring evening with Isla Kendrew, a former humanitarian strategist turned innovation consultant whose work has spanned over 30 countries. Isla has advised global nonprofits, early-stage startups, and Fortune 500 leaders on how to stay creative and effective in times of uncertainty.

Known for her calm presence and thought-provoking insights, Isla brings a rare perspective on leadership, resilience, and finding clarity when the path ahead is unclear. Her TEDx talk, “When the Map Disappears,” has resonated with thousands seeking purpose in unpredictable times.

The evening includes a relaxed fireside chat, audience Q&A, and time to connect with fellow members over drinks.


Schedule

7:00 PM – Welcome drinks & mingling

7:30 PM – Fireside chat with Isla Kendrew

8:15 PM – Q&A

8:45 PM – Wine, dessert & networking

Free for members | Guests €30

Spaces are limited – RSVP required.
